summary: Protest encompasses various forms of expressing dissent and advocating for change. It extends beyond traditional demonstrations to include strategic actions like voting with one's feet. This concept involves making impactful choices through thoughtful decision-making, creative problem-solving, and collaborative efforts. Protest can manifest in diverse ways, from public demonstrations to consumer choices and even fan activism. It emphasizes the power of individual and collective action in shaping society and influencing systems. The associated resources explore how protest can be effectively employed to voice values and create meaningful change across different aspects of life.
excerpt: Vote With Your Feet combines strategic thinking with tactical action. It encourages innovative problem-solving, promotes inclusivity, and fosters collaboration. By mastering these skills, individuals can effectively express their values and make impactful choices in various aspects of life.
